author: sarowe
msg: LUCENE-3753: build-contrib dependendency should be on compile-test, which compiles all test and non-test sources under lucene/, rather than on common.compile-test; otherwise, build outputs go to the wrong place and trigger a build failure.

author: sarowe
msg: LUCENE-3753: build-contrib dependendency should be on compile-test, which compiles all test and non-test sources under lucene/, rather than on common.compile-test; otherwise, build outputs go to the wrong place and trigger a build failure.
